channel.title: Lore & History on Shadow of the End
channel.description: Recent content in Lore & History on Shadow of the End

item.title: The Dark Fever
item.description: The Dark Fever refers to a catastrophic event that took long time ago. It was a disaster of immense proportions, resulting in widespread destruction and devastation. This catastrophe led to significant loss of life, collapse of infrastructure, and environmental degradation on a global scale. The exact cause of The Dark Fever remains unknown, though it is speculated to be either a pandemic or some other mass-infectious disease that swept across the world with alarming rapidity.
